SELECT da.id, da.project_id, da.name, da.code, da.is_active, da.is_synchro, da.gitlab_project_id, da.app_template_id, da.uuid FROM devops_application da where da.project_id = #{projectId}
AND da.is_active = TRUE
AND da.is_active = FALSE
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM devops_app_version dav WHERE dav.app_id = da.id )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM devops_app_version dav WHERE dav.app_id = da.id )
ORDER BY da.is_active desc, ( da.is_synchro = 1 AND da.gitlab_project_id IS NOT NULL ) OR da.is_synchro = 0 DESC, da.id desc
SELECT da.* FROM devops_application da WHERE da.is_active AND da.gitlab_project_id is not null AND da.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT dam.publish_level publishLevel, dam.contributor, dam.description, da.* FROM devops_application da JOIN devops_app_instance dai ON dai.app_id = da.id AND dai.`status` != 'deleted' JOIN devops_env de ON dai.env_id = de.id LEFT JOIN devops_app_market dam ON dam.app_id = da.id WHERE da.is_active AND de.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY dam.publish_level ASC, da.id DESC

SELECT da.`id`, da.`code`, da.`name` FROM devops_application da WHERE da.project_id = #{projectId} AND da.is_active = #{active} AND ((select count(1) from devops_app_market dam where da.id=dam.app_id)=0) AND ((select count(1) from devops_app_version dav where da.id=dav.app_id)>0)

SELECT da.id, da.project_id, da.name, da.code, da.is_active, da.is_synchro, da.gitlab_project_id, da.app_template_id, da.uuid, da.token, da.object_version_number FROM devops_application da WHERE da.token = #{token}

SELECT count( 1 ) FROM devops_application da WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM devops_app_market dam WHERE dam.app_id = da.id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM devops_app_instance dai JOIN devops_app_version dav ON dav.id = dai.app_version_id WHERE dai.`status` != "deleted" AND dav.app_id = da.id ) AND da.id = #{applicationId};
SELECT da.`id`, da.project_id FROM devops_application da join devops_app_market dam on da.id = dam.app_id WHERE da.code = #{code}

SELECT da.id, da.project_id, da.name, da.code, da.is_active, da.is_synchro, da.gitlab_project_id, da.app_template_id, da.uuid FROM devops_application da where da.project_id = #{projectId} AND da.is_active = 1 AND da.gitlab_project_id IS NOT NULL
